title: How to Transfer MB on Airtel

steps.title: Verify that the individual to whom you’re transferring MB is on Airtel’s network.
steps.content: Verify that the individual to whom you’re transferring MB is on Airtel’s network. You can only transfer MB to those who also have service with Airtel.

steps.title: Determine the amount of MB you want to transfer.
steps.content: Determine the amount of MB you want to transfer. At this time, you can only transfer MB in increments of 10, 25, and 60.

steps.title: Dial *141*712*.
steps.content: Dial *141*712* . This is the start of the code to send MB on Airtel. Do not send the call just yet.

steps.title: Add one of the following codes after the star (*).
steps.content: Add one of the following codes after the star (*). Depending on how much data you want to send, add one of the following codes. You can only send data once per day. 10 MB: 11* 25 MB: 9* 60 MB: 4*

steps.title: Add the recipient's number followed by a pound (#) sign.
steps.content: Add the recipient's number followed by a pound (#) sign. Dial the recipients 10 digit number followed by the pound sign (#) after the star (*). The entire code should look something like this: *141*712*9*8888888888#

steps.title: Send the call.
steps.content: Send the call. Press the button that resembles a phone on dial-pad to send the call. This sends data to the person you want to transfer data to. You can only make one transaction per day. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Follow the information on the screen.
steps.content: Follow the information on the screen. After sending the call, follow the information on the screen for further instructions.
